text: Stade de Genève (Stadium of Geneva), also called Stade de la Praille, is a football stadium in Lancy, Switzerland and is the home stadium of Servette FC. It was used for the UEFA Euro 2008. It has a capacity of 30,084. The stadium was opened on 30 April 2003. == Other websites == * Stade de Genève official website Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland Category:Football stadiums in Switzerland Category:Geneva
title: Stade de Genève
